CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: At SOPHiA GENETICS, we are bringing the power of data and artificial intelligence to healthcare. Our AI platform analyzes multimodal data - including genomics, radiomics, clinical, biological, and digital pathology data - to generate actionable insights for patients with cancer or rare diseases. Today, over 770 healthcare institutions use our cloud-native, consumption-based SaaS platform to bring the power of data-driven medicine to millions of patients across the globe. Beyond the clinical market, our platform is used by BioPharma partners for AI-powered drug discovery, development, and deployment.
